metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24502 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper input validation in some Intel(R) Ethernet E810 Adapter drivers for Linux before version 1.0.4 and before version 1.4.29.0 for Windows*, may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: sbeattie> these are Intel's out-of-tree drivers.

criterions.comment: linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-raspi').
